name: Fogged Up Puzzles
description:
Fogged Up Puzzles

Prototype puzzle game, where the player has to use crystals to light the way onward through dark fog...

 

Controls

Point and click on the ground to move the player

WASD and arrow keys to control the camera

Spacebar to interact

R to restart the level

Esc to quit the game

 

Credits

Programmers: Noel Söyrinki, Max Johansson

Artists: Sara Kolehmainen, Ariana Hosseini, Ronja

 

Music by BalanceBay from Pixabay
